title: Geo
description: The geographic related data where an event was observed.

xdm:countryISO.title: Country code
xdm:countryISO.description: The two-character [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://datahub.io/core/country-list) code for the country.

stateProvinceISO.title: State or Province ISO Code.
stateProvinceISO.description: The country subdivision as defined by the second part of [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html#2012_iso3166-2)(without the first part and the hyphen ISO 3166-1 alpha-2). Example: `CA` from ISO 3166-2 `US-CA` value designating the state of California in the United States of America. Example `75`: from ISO 3166-2 `FR-75` value designating the metropolitan department of Paris in France. NOTE: This value must be combined with countryCodeISO to compose valid ISO 3166-2 code.

xdm:postalCode.title: Postal code
xdm:postalCode.description: The postal code of the location. Postal codes are not available for all countries. In some countries, this will only contain part of the postal code.

xdm:dmaID.title: Designated Market Area
xdm:dmaID.description: The Nielsen Media Research designated market area.

xdm:msaID.title: Metropolitan Statistical Area
xdm:msaID.description: The Metropolitan Statistical Area in the USA where the observation occurred.
